IsMountable.Description: Whether this NPC can be mounted.

IsMemory.Description: Whether this NPC is a memory.

ViewRange.Description: The range from which the target will be seen.

ViewSector.Description: The view sector within which the target needs to be to be seen.

HearingRange.Description: The range from which the target will be heard.

AbsoluteDetectionRange.Description: The range at which a target is guaranteed to be detected.

ClimbHeight.Description: The maximum climb height, in blocks.

AscentAnimationType.Description: Animation when climbing up. Options: Walk, Jump, Climb, Fly, Idle.

DescendSpeedCompensation.Description: Factor to compensate forward speed reduction while moving downwards.

DescendFlatness.Description: Relative scale how fast NPC moves forward while climbing down.

DescentSteepness.Description: The relative steepness of the descent.

DescentBlending.Description: Blending of the descent pattern. 0 is linear, higher values more curved.

LeashDistance.Description: The range after which an NPC will start to want to return to their spawn point.
